long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Is your Twitch chat too crowded with spam? This chat filter uses a combination of a deep learning NLP network and a linear regression model to filter out unwanted spam messages from your Twitch chat. Our model runs entirely in-browser, so your data never leaves Twitch and we don't store any identifying information about you. We also have a UI to allow you to customize your chat.
